tech_news.title: The Google app is intentionally replacing Pixel Launcher search - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: In the past few days, tapping the Pixel Launcher search bar opens a different screen powered by the Google app. This is not a bug...

tech_news.title: BG3 studio Larian says it's using genAI for Divinity, but not 'looking at trimming down teams to replace them' - Polygon
tech_news.description: Divinity, the next game from Baldur's Gate 3 devs Larian, employs AI and machine learning, but not at the expense of creators, Swen Vincke says.

tech_news.title: Leaked debug kit suggests Apple is testing a new “iMac Pro,” among many other Macs - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: Resurrected high-end all-in-one could be a worthy successor to 2017’s iMac Pro.

tech_news.title: The Elder Scrolls 6 Dev Says 'We're Going to Take Our Time and as Long as It Needs to Be Great,' Points to GTA 6 Delay as 'The Smartest Thing They Could Do' - IGN
tech_news.description: Bethesda developers including chief Todd Howard have issued an update on The Elder Scrolls 6 — but stopped short of confirming a release date.

tech_news.title: Meta’s AI glasses can now help you hear conversations better - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Conversation focus uses the AI glasses' open-ear speakers to amplify the voice of the person you're talking to, says Meta.

tech_news.title: Enter the Mob Maze - Minecraft
tech_news.description: Step into Mob Maze, a roguelite multiplayer adventure with SUPER-SIZED environments and scaled-up obstacles, available through the Server list in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition! Do you have what it takes to conquer this colossal place with your unique abilities, …

tech_news.title: Goblins and Gifts Galore in Goblin Greedings — Diablo IV - Blizzard News
tech_news.description: Goblin Greedings descends on Sanctuary as Treasure Goblin variants roam in increased numbers and bountiful spoils. Earn bonus Whisper Caches and claim free holiday cosmetics.

tech_news.title: Google wants its AI assistant CC to replace your morning scroll - The Verge
tech_news.description: Google’s AI agent CC is similar to OpenAI’s ChatGPT Pulse, delivering a personalized morning briefing based on your Gmail, Google Calendar, and Google Drive.

tech_news.title: Sony’s XM5 over-ear headphones are cheaper than ever — and they come with free wireless earbuds - The Verge
tech_news.description: Sony’s noise-canceling WH-1000XM5 headphones are currently at an all-time low price, and come with free wireless earbuds you can gift to someone for the holidays.

tech_news.title: Scott Pilgrim Creator Bryan Lee O'Malley's Three Favorite Games Of All Time - Game Informer
tech_news.description: We spoke with Bryan Lee O'Malley about working on Scott Pilgrim EX, his all-time favorite games, and why he hasn't upgraded to PlayStation 5.
